# robodeck

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Utilize the 'OpenAI' 'API' to generate 'Quarto' slide decks quickly.

## Installation

You can install the development version of robodeck from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jonthegeek/robodeck")
```
